content:
To: All Staff
From: Management
Date: October 26
Subject: Annual Performance Reviews

This is a reminder that annual performance reviews will be conducted from November 10 to November 21. All employees are required to schedule a 30-minute meeting with their direct supervisor during this period. Please complete the self-evaluation form, which can be downloaded from the company intranet, and submit it to your supervisor at least two days prior to your scheduled meeting. Your review will cover your accomplishments over the past year and goals for the upcoming year. Your active participation is crucial for a productive discussion.

questions.problem: What is the main purpose of this memo?

options.A: To announce a new company policy
options.B: To remind employees about upcoming reviews

questions.explanation: メモの件名 (Subject) と最初の文で「年次の業績評価 (annual performance reviews) が行われることのリマインダーである」と明確に述べられています。

questions.problem: What must employees do before their meeting?

options.B: Schedule a meeting with the management
options.C: Complete and submit a self-evaluation form
options.D: Prepare a presentation on their accomplishments

questions.explanation: メモには「自己評価フォーム (self-evaluation form) に記入し、予定されている会議の少なくとも2日前に上司に提出してください」と記載されています。

content:
City Gazette – Community News Section
New Library Opening

The new Oakville Public Library branch will officially open its doors on Saturday, November 18, at 10:00 a.m. Located on River Street, the modern facility features a reading lounge, meeting rooms, and digital media labs. A ribbon-cutting ceremony will be held, followed by family-friendly events including a book giveaway, storytelling sessions, and workshops. All are welcome to attend.

questions.problem: What is being announced in the article?
questions.explanation: 「The new Oakville Public Library branch will officially open...」と書かれており、新しい図書館の開館が主題である。

questions.problem: What will happen after the ribbon-cutting ceremony?

options.A: A press conference will be held
options.D: The mayor will give a speech

questions.explanation: 「family-friendly events including a book giveaway...」とあり、式典後にはイベントが行われることがわかる。

content:
From: Riko Yamamoto <riko.y@brighttravel.jp>
To: Daniel Brown <dbrown@topclients.com>
Subject: Confirmation of Hotel Reservation
Date: May 2

Dear Mr. Brown,

Thank you for choosing Bright Travel. This e-mail is to confirm your hotel reservation at Seaside Resort from June 10 to June 15. Your room is a Deluxe Ocean View Suite with breakfast included. Check-in time is 3:00 p.m., and check-out time is 11:00 a.m. If you have any special requests or need airport transportation, please let us know in advance.

Best regards,
Riko Yamamoto

questions.problem: What is the purpose of this email?
questions.explanation: 件名に「Confirmation of Hotel Reservation」、本文に「confirm your hotel reservation」と明記されています。

questions.problem: What is included with the room?
questions.explanation: 「with breakfast included」と記載されているため、朝食が含まれています。

content:
NOTICE TO CUSTOMERS

Due to scheduled maintenance, all ATM machines at the Eastview branch will be unavailable from 1:00 a.m. to 5:00 a.m. on Saturday, July 8. Customers are advised to withdraw any necessary cash in advance. Online banking services will not be affected.

We apologize for any inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

questions.problem: What is the purpose of this notice?

options.A: To announce a new ATM service
options.B: To warn about a service interruption

questions.explanation: 「ATM machines...will be unavailable」とあり、利用停止の通知であることがわかります。

questions.problem: Which service will still be available?
questions.explanation: 「Online banking services will not be affected」と明記されています。

「This offer is valid from Friday to Sunday only」とあり、日曜までと明記されています。
